snippet: Regulators are cracking down on products like Buckyballs, saying they are too attractive and hazardous to young consumers.
abstract: Consumer Product Safety Commission is cracking down on toy magnets, like Buckyballs, made from rare-earth elements saying even though they are marketed to adults and have warning labels, they are too attractive and hazardous to curious children, who sometimes swallow them.
lead_paragraph: Regulators are cracking down on products like Buckyballs, saying they are too attractive and hazardous to young consumers.

headline.seo: For Buckyballs Toys, Child Safety Is a Growing Issue
headline.main: For Buckyballs Toys, Child Safety Is a Growing Issue
